mapper.select:
SELECT proNum, proName, proPrice, proDes, proImg, proDate, proImg, proThumbImg FROM product where 1 = 1
and (proName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or proDes like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by proDate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (proName, proPrice, proDes, proImg, proThumbImg) values(#{proName},#{proPrice},#{proDes},#{proImg},#{proThumbImg})
